OUTLINE : This open-label , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord prior objective response endocrine therapy ( yes v ) . Patients receive oral anastrozole daily alone 2 week . Patients receive oral anastrozole oral ZD 1839 daily 28 day . Courses repeat every 28 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow 1 month monthly thereafter .
